project.title: MICA - Muskrat and Coypu
project.description: This project is part of the LIFE project MICA, in which innovative techniques are tested for a more efficient control of muskrat and coypu populations, both invasive species. Camera traps were located in areas where the presence of muskrat and/or coypu was suspected.

organizations.title: Research Institute for Nature and Forest (INBO)

resources.name: deployments
resources.title: Camera trap deployments
resources.description: Table with camera trap deployments. Includes `deployment_id`, start, end, location and camera setup information.

schema.title: Deployments
schema.description: Table with camera trap deployments. Includes `deployment_id`, start, end, location and camera setup information.

fields.name: deployment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the deployment.

fields.name: location_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the sampling location for this deployment.

fields.name: location_name
fields.description: Name given to the sampling location.

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the sampling location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the sampling location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: start
fields.description: Date and time when the deployment started, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: end
fields.description: Date and time when the deployment ended, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: setup_by
fields.description: Name or unique identifier of the person who set up the camera for this deployment.

fields.name: camera_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the camera used for this deployment. This can be e.g. the camera device serial number.

fields.name: camera_model
fields.description: Manufacturer and model of the camera provided in this format: `manufacturer-model`.

fields.name: camera_interval
fields.description: Time specified between shutter triggers when activity in the sensor will not trigger the shutter. Specified in seconds.

fields.name: camera_height
fields.description: An approximate height at which the camera was deployed. Specified in meters.

fields.name: bait_use
fields.description: Type of bait (if any) that was used for this deployment. If other, more info can be provided in the `comments` field.

fields.name: feature_type
fields.description: Type of feature (if any) that camera deployment is associated with. If other, more info can be provided in the `comments` field.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: User defined tags associated with the deployment, as a pipe (`|`) separated list.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the deployment.

resources.name: multimedia
resources.title: Camera trap multimedia
resources.description: Table with multimedia files (images/videos) captured by the camera traps. Associated with deployments (`deployment_id`) and organized in sequences (`sequence_id`). Includes timestamp and file path.

schema.title: Multimedia
schema.description: Table with multimedia files (images/videos) captured by the camera traps. Associated with deployments (`deployment_id`) and organized in sequences (`sequence_id`). Includes timestamp and file path.

fields.name: multimedia_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the multimedia file.

fields.name: deployment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the deployment this observation belongs to. Foreign key to `deployment:deployment_id`.

fields.name: sequence_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the sequence this multimedia file belongs to. Sequences contain one or more multimedia files (e.g. a single image or video or a sequence of successive images or videos) and are defined by `sequence_interval` in the package metadata.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Date and time when the multimedia file was recorded, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: file_path
fields.description: Url or relative path to the multimedia file, respectively for externally hosted files or files that are part of this package. Additional information on how to access this file is provided in a package-level metadata.

fields.name: file_name
fields.description: Name of a multimedia file. When this field is included, one should be able to sort multimedia chronologically within a deployment on `timestamp` (first) and `file_name` (second).

fields.name: file_mediatype
fields.description: Mediatype of a multimedia file.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the multimedia file.

resources.name: observations
resources.title: Camera trap observations
resources.description: Table with observations based on the multimedia files. Associated with deployments (`deployment_id`), sequences (`sequence_id`) and optionally individual multimedia files (`multimedia_id`). Observations can mark non-animal events (camera setup, human, empty) or one or more animal observations (`observation_type` = `animal`) of a certain species, count, age, sex, behaviour and/or individual.

schema.title: Observations
schema.description: Table with observations based on the multimedia files. Associated with deployments (`deployment_id`), sequences (`sequence_id`) and optionally individual multimedia files (`multimedia_id`). Observations can mark non-animal events (camera setup, human, empty) or one or more animal observations (`observation_type` = `animal`) of a certain taxon, count, age, sex, behaviour and/or individual.

fields.name: observation_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the observation.

fields.name: deployment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the deployment this observation belongs to. Foreign key to `deployment:deployment_id`.

fields.name: sequence_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the sequence (collection of multimedia files grouped by a predefined `sequence_interval`) that is the source of this observation. Foreign key to `multimedia:sequence_id`.

fields.name: multimedia_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the multimedia file that is the source of this observation. Foreign key to `multimedia:multimedia_id`. Include but leave empty for sequence-based observations.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Date and time of the observation, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`). For file-based observations this is the `timestamp` of the associated multimedia file (in `multimedia_id`), for sequence-based observations the `timestamp` of the first multimedia file in the associated sequence (in `sequence_id`).

fields.name: observation_type
fields.description: Type of observation. All categories in this vocabulary have to be understandable from an AI point of view. `undefined` describes classifications with a confidence level below some predefined threshold i.e. neither humans nor AI can say what was recorded.

fields.name: sensor_method
fields.description: Method of triggering the camera for this observation.

fields.name: camera_setup
fields.description: `true` if this observation is part of the camera setup process (camera deployment, pickup, maintenance).

fields.name: scientific_name
fields.description: Scientific name of the observed individual(s).

fields.name: taxon_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the `scientific_name` according to the taxonomic reference list defined by `taxon_id_reference` in the package metadata.

fields.name: count
fields.description: Number of observed individuals (optionally of given age, sex and behaviour).

fields.name: age
fields.description: Age of observed individual(s)

fields.name: sex
fields.description: Sex of observed individual(s)

fields.name: behaviour
fields.description: Dominant behaviour of observed individual(s), ideally expressed as controlled values (e.g. grazing, browsing, rooting, vigilance, running, walking). A combination of dominant (first) and additional behaviours can be expressed as as a pipe (`|`) separated list.

fields.name: individual_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the observed individual.

fields.name: classification_method
fields.description: Classification method.

fields.name: classified_by
fields.description: Name or unique identifier of the person or AI algorithm that classified this observation.

fields.name: classification_timestamp
fields.description: Date and time of the classification, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: classification_confidence
fields.description: Accuracy confidence of the classification. Specified as probability, with `1` being maximum confidence. Provide an approximate value for human classifications.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the observation.
